title: How to stream on Twitch from your Windows PC
content:
Live streaming is one of the most popular forms of entertainment on the internet, and it’s grown into a pretty massive market. Because of how popular it is, many of us (myself included) have felt the temptation to get into streaming, even if we don’t plan to do it professionally. Getting started can feel like

The post How to stream on Twitch from your Windows PC appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Want to get into live streaming? We're here to show you how to stream from your PC live on Twitch, the most popular streaming platform.
